about:
Hello, my name is Armando Parra. I am second year student at Drexel University studying Computer Science. I am Ecuadorian on both sides of my family, and I am fluent in Spanish. I love trying new foods and playing video games.


I am passionate about my work, and because of the passion, I have a motivation to go above and beyond to do my best. I am willing to challenge myself and set myself up for failure at times, so that I can improve my skills and become a better developer.
